descriptionHtml:
A very basic follower.
A dark elf that can be found in Dragonsreach.
His high one-Handed and heavy armor skills complement his starting equipment of Blades armor (minus helmet) and Blades sword well. He is also capable of using unrelenting force and Fire breath shouts.
As I said hes very simple so he uses the default dark elf voice. He's intended as a powerful follower to assist early-game and new players.
author: ShadowHawk722
